amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), in consultation with other relevant government agencies, to report to Congress on efforts to identify viable alternatives to firefighting foam and other related equipment containing PFAS.
